ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Suite of tools for managing cached files, targeting use in other R packages. Uses 'rappdirs' for cross-platform paths. Provides utilities to manage cache directories, including targeting files by path or by key; cached directories can be compressed and uncompressed easily to save disk space.

Suite of tools for managing cached files, targeting use in other R packages. Uses 'rappdirs' for cross-platform paths. Provides utilities to manage cache directories, including targeting files by path or by key; cached directories can be compressed and uncompressed easily to save disk space.

name: r-hoardr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.5" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-hoardr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/hoardr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/hoardr/hoardr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 6e703357f9bdf887c2640b7e9edc657255dd1dc0457fbca1a5e2d850da0cd439

build:
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-r6 >=2.2.0
    - r-digest
    - r-rappdirs >=0.3.1
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r6 >=2.2.0
    - r-digest
    - r-rappdirs >=0.3.1

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('hoardr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('hoardr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/hoardr
  license: MIT
  summary: Suite of tools for managing cached files, targeting use in other R packages. Uses 'rappdirs' for cross-platform paths. Provides utilities to manage cache directories, including targeting files by path or by key; cached directories can be compressed and uncompressed easily to save disk space.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf
